title: Russians took her son, so she traveled 3,000 miles to get him back
description: One family's experience is part of what Ukraine says is Russia’s systematic and large-scale effort to erase the country's identity.

title: Tick and mosquito season is already shaping up to be severe this year
description: With the CDC warning about the first locally acquired cases of malaria in 20 years, experts say ticks and mosquitoes pose strong threats this summer.

title: Madonna hospitalized with 'serious' infection, tour paused as she recovers
description: Madonna, 64, is pausing her upcoming tour as she recovers from a "serious bacterial infection" that had her hospitalized, her manager said Wednesday.

title: Meta and TikTok unveil new parental controls aimed at protecting teens
description: Meta and TikTok are giving parents more control over kids' social media use. Author Bea Moise tells NBC News' Joe Fryer that, while social media companies do what they can, parents also need to be proactive in protecting their kids.

title: Ron DeSantis vetoes popular criminal justice bill as he moves to Trump's right
description: Ron DeSantis, in his latest move to get to the right of Trump, issued a surprise veto on Tuesday, of a popular criminal justice reform bill.

title: Passenger rescued after falling off 10th deck of cruise ship, Coast Guard says
description: A Royal Caribbean passenger was rescued Sunday after falling overboard from the 10th deck of a cruise ship near the Dominican Republic, the U.S.Coast Guard said.

title: 'Dramatic increase': Online harassment rates surge by 51% in a year, ADL report reveals
description: The Anti-Defamation League's annual report reveals that 51% of teens and 33% of adults experienced online harassment, marking a significant increase from previous years. The report emphasizes the urgent necessity for social media companies to prioritize user safety and take concrete steps to combat hate speech. ADL Vice President of Technology & Society, Yael Eisenstat joins Morning Joe to discuss.

title: Simone Biles set to return to competition for first time since 2021 Tokyo Olympics
description: Gymnastics superstar Simone Biles is set to take the competitive stage later this summer, in her first sanctioned event in nearly two years, officials said Wednesday.

title: 'Superman: Legacy' casts David Corenswet as Clark Kent and Rachel Brosnahan as Lois Lane
description: DC Studios has knighted a new Clark Kent and Lois Lane.

title: Google distances itself from company-sponsored drag show following employee petition
description: Google is distancing itself from a drag performance it planned as the closing event for Pride month after a group of employees circulated an internal petition.

title: Anger and division roil Russian fighters after mercenary rebellion
description: Wagner mercenary group chief Yevgeny Prigozhin trafficked in fury to cultivate his status as a public champion of the legions of hard-line pro-war voices who were disillusioned with Russia’s military leadership.

title: GOP presidential candidates want the Moms for Liberty vote in Pennsylvania after local victories
description: Moms for Liberty members praise a Pennsylvania school district’s policy changes that draw federal complaints by the ACLU

title: FBI and SEC respond to complaints about Twitter audio star Mario Nawfal
description: Federal authorities are reviewing complaints filed against Mario Nawfal, an entrepreneur who has emerged in recent months as one of Twitter’s biggest audio stars, according to two people who said they spoke with FBI and SEC officials this week.

title: House Republicans embark on a mission: Avenge Trump
description: House Republicans are using the powers of their majority to carry out former President Donald Trump’s quest for retribution against his political adversaries.

title: Trump explores messing with the first GOP debate
description: NBC News interviewed more than a half-dozen advisers to Trump who said it was clear the former president was leaning against participating in the August debate.

title: Have you heard the one about the old president? Well, Biden has a joke for you
description: President Joe Biden is increasingly joking about his age, according to an NBC News analysis of his remarks.

title: Poor air quality live updates: Chicago and Detroit smothered by Canadian wildfire smoke
description: Poor air quality live updates: Chicago and Detroit smothered by Canadian wildfire smoke

title: Ex-NFL player Ryan Mallett dies in apparent drowning at Florida beach
description: Former pro football player Ryan Mallett died in an apparent drowning in Florida on Tuesday, officials said.

title: Cheney says she won't do anything that 'helps' Trump as she weighs White House bid
description: Former Rep. Liz Cheney is staying mum on her 2024 plans but said Tuesday that she has no intention of taking any steps that would help Trump return to office.
